hymn.category: Fulness of the Spirit—The Anointing, Sealing, and Pledging

lyrics.stanza: In the Word of God I found it, Wonderful this Word to me; I need not man's natural teaching, The anointing lives in me!
Yes, in my spirit now He is moving! Yes, I have the anointing! God in me is flowing! Thank God, I see it! His Word revealed it! I will apply it ever! The anointing lives in me!
Making Christ experiential, God at His pure Word I take; As the Spirit joined unto me, He cannot His promise break.
Based upon the blood that cleanses So that nothing stands between, Christ, the ointment, moves within me! For His move I'm made so clean.
God in Christ as life in Spirit Into my own spirit came! He the Holy One anoints me Till in spirit we're the same.
As I heed "that same anointing" Ever to "abide in Him," He is teaching, He is reaching, Even all my heart to win.
